parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.56

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Eden Editor

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Mission Information

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns all entities within specific [[Eden Editor]] layer. To be used when the scenario is running, not in the editor workspace.

Useful for disabling / enabling whole parts of the scenario which you add to specific layer while editing.
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Informative </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> Default layers are not returned.</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[getMissionLayerEntities]] layerName

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> layerName: [[String]] - Layer name in the editor. If multiple layers with the same name are present in the scenario, the first found one is used.

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Array]] in format <code>[objects:Array, markers:Array]</code>

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_base = [[getMissionLayerEntities]] "Base";</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[waitUntil]] {([[player]] [[distance]] _someObject) > 800};
{
	[[deleteVehicle]] [[Magic Variables#x|_x]];
} [[forEach]] (([[getMissionLayerEntities]] "Simple Objects") [[select]] 0); <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>Deletes all objects within that layer after the player is over 800m away from _someObject</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> <code>_layer1337Entities = [[getMissionLayerEntities]] 1337;</code>

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> [[getMissionLayerEntities]] layerID

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> layerID: [[Number]] - Layer ID in the editor.

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Array]] in format <code>[objects:Array, markers:Array]</code>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[get3DENLayerEntities]]

</value></part><part><name>serverExec</name>=<value> server
</value></part></template>


<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on October 26, 2016 - 15:27 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:R3vo|R3vo]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
After an [[object]] was deleted from a layer, [[getMissionLayerEntities]] will return <NULL-object> for the deleted [[object]].
<br>
<br>
Version: 1.65<br>
Build: 139010<br>
</dd>
</dl>
